question.title: Spring Boot Admin: Tons of timeouts
question.body:
In my Spring Boot Admin 3.5.0 environment I can see lots of errors (even if they're logged as INFO or WARN) like the following:

2025-06-06T02:35:32.116Z  INFO 1 --- [Zookeepers Monitoring] [     parallel-1] d.c.b.a.server.services.StatusUpdater    : Couldn't retrieve status for Instance ...

java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: Did not observe any item or terminal signal within 9000ms in 'log' (and no fallback has been configured)
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutMainSubscriber.handleTimeout(FluxTimeout.java:296) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutMainSubscriber.doTimeout(FluxTimeout.java:281) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutTimeoutSubscriber.onNext(FluxTimeout.java:420) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxOnErrorReturn$ReturnSubscriber.onNext(FluxOnErrorReturn.java:162) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.MonoDelay$MonoDelayRunnable.propagateDelay(MonoDelay.java:270) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.MonoDelay$MonoDelayRunnable.run(MonoDelay.java:285) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.scheduler.SchedulerTask.call(SchedulerTask.java:68) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.scheduler.SchedulerTask.call(SchedulerTask.java:28) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]

2025-06-06T03:34:04.299Z  WARN 1 --- [Zookeepers Monitoring] [     parallel-1] d.c.b.admin.server.services.InfoUpdater  : Couldn't retrieve info for Instance(...)

java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: Did not observe any item or terminal signal within 10000ms in 'peek' (and no fallback has been configured)
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutMainSubscriber.handleTimeout(FluxTimeout.java:296) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    Suppressed: reactor.core.publisher.FluxOnAssembly$OnAssemblyException: 
Error has been observed at the following site(s):
    *__checkpoint â‡¢ Request to GET info [DefaultWebClient]
Original Stack Trace:
        at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutMainSubscriber.handleTimeout(FluxTimeout.java:296) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutMainSubscriber.doTimeout(FluxTimeout.java:281) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.publisher.FluxTimeout$TimeoutTimeoutSubscriber.onNext(FluxTimeout.java:420) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.publisher.FluxOnErrorReturn$ReturnSubscriber.onNext(FluxOnErrorReturn.java:162) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.publisher.MonoDelay$MonoDelayRunnable.propagateDelay(MonoDelay.java:270) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.publisher.MonoDelay$MonoDelayRunnable.run(MonoDelay.java:285) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.scheduler.SchedulerTask.call(SchedulerTask.java:68) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at reactor.core.scheduler.SchedulerTask.call(SchedulerTask.java:28) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
        at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]

2025-06-06T03:34:04.410Z  WARN 1 --- [Zookeepers Monitoring] [     parallel-1] d.c.b.a.server.services.IntervalCheck    : Unexpected error in status-check

reactor.core.Exceptions$OverflowException: Could not emit tick 433 due to lack of requests (interval doesn't support small downstream requests that replenish slower than the ticks)
    at reactor.core.Exceptions.failWithOverflow(Exceptions.java:251) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.publisher.FluxInterval$IntervalRunnable.run(FluxInterval.java:131) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.scheduler.PeriodicWorkerTask.call(PeriodicWorkerTask.java:59) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at reactor.core.scheduler.PeriodicWorkerTask.run(PeriodicWorkerTask.java:73) ~[reactor-core-3.7.6.jar:3.7.6]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ~[na:na]

Regarding retries and timeout configurations, I'm using the default values.

Can you please provide some help to fix this situation?
